I used to hum while I gardened... I can't hum anymore.
I was promised to be married, but I'm sure the girl is dead now.
My last mentor wasn't very nice... was she?
I miss bread. Just plain, crusty bread.
My old horse's name was Plop. I think he hated me.
Sometimes I still dream of my childhood bedroom. It was cold, and smelled like potatoes.
There was a lullaby my mother sang... I can't remember it. That hurts the most.
